Package com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.engines

Class Zuc128CoreEngine

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.Zuc128CoreEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
StreamCipher, Memoable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Zuc128Engine, Zuc256CoreEngine
public class Zuc128CoreEngine extends Object implements StreamCipher, Memoable
Zuc128Engine implementation. Based on https://www.gsma.com/aboutus/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/eea3eia3zucv16.pdf
